name: css-border-collapse
description: Css module of single purpose classes for border collapse

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-border-collapse.css > css/css-border-collapse.css && tachyons src/css-border-collapse.css --minify > css/css-border-collapse.min.css && tachyons src/css-border-collapse.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
